pr_title: [aws-api] Run tests against ApiCategory, not Amplify

timeline.message:
[aws-api] Run tests against ApiCategory, not Amplify

The Amplify singleton is problematic to test, since it hangs onto static
references of its once-configured categories.

Instead, test fresh instances of the ApiCategory, instead of the Ampilfy
facade.
